Members, over night, I was informed my Ebay account was hacked. Whilst 
no real malicious damage was done to me, it appears the account was used 
to solicit business through dodgy emails and the such.

If you receive any emails from the Ebay account nippon_to please email 
me Richard Turner @ ikkanshi@... to confirm.

Regards

Richard Turner
